text: The king of the north will return to his own country with all the wealth he has looted.11:28. “He has looted”: implied. He will be determined to attack11:28. “Be determined to attack”: literally, “set his heart against.” In addition, the word “people” is added as an explanation, since the action taken is against them as believers. the people of the holy agreement, and do all he can to destroy it before returning to his own country.
